name: 修复字典数据中的语法错误 (Fix syntax error in dictionary data)
description: Fixed the syntax error caused by extra closing brace and text around line 483 in `src/data/dictionaryData.ts`.

name: 批量补充成语释义和例句 (Batch populate idiom meanings and examples)
description: Systematically replaced all placeholders for idioms starting with 'A' (including 'An', 'Ang', 'Ao') with accurate meanings and examples.

name: 验证剩余占位符 (Verify remaining placeholders)
description: Verified and fixed user-reported missing entries (e.g., '昂首伸眉', '卬首信眉', '昂首天外'). Confirmed file integrity.
